title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: You can transform a difficult situation at work into a better one with grace, manners, and positive reinforcement. Perhaps a public relations crisis with a customer or colleague presses you to play spin doctor to soothe a raging ego. Although someones actions may seem initially offensive, one way to secure a pleasant resolution is to respect everyones feelings while diplomatic Venus soars through your 10th House of Success. Be kind and listen with the intent to minimize the drama. Sometimes, all people need to know is that they matter. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
